comments:
* Turn off filters for configs in deleted projects
* Select a config from deleted project
* Turn on filter for deleted projects (from LCD button)
* Selection in LCD remains on filtered config.

> selection should be updated when filters are changed

fixed in HEAD, changed LaunchConfigurationsDialog to do more intelligent selection handling, also moved the filter action to its own action class, following the convention of other debug actions (see FilterLaunchConfigurationAction).

When possible, the selection should remain in the same config type list. For example, I had a Java app selected, and then changed filters so it was no longer present. I ended up with an Eclipse Application selected even though there were more Java apps. The selection should try to remain in the same branch of the tree, on the same child index (i.e. 3rd child of parent), and if not possible, move up to a lesser child. Failing that it should select the config type.

fixed in HEAD with new selection changes:

1. remain in same branch of tree if other configs exist
2. moves to type if no more configs exist
3. moves to next type if more types exist
4. follows old selection style; if there is no previous launch when the dialog opens, make no selection.
5. if everything is filtered a message is displayed

see LaunchConfigurationsDialog for changes
